channel.title: Making server 24/7?
channel.description:
Hello, I got a small question: is it possible to make your server 24/7 by buying a server from a site who can host it for you and you can change stuff on the server through the FTP? If it is could someone give me a link for a good site where to buy that or if someone knows a better idea could you post it here too.
greetings, Holypeace.

item.title: Making server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You use Remote Desktop Control to edit server server on the other person’s computer who is hosting the server. I’ve done it before.

Read full topic

item.title: Making server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @shayd3e shayd3e
item.description:
@shayd3e wrote:

you can find some good
Dedicated servers from google or a VPS (Visual Private Server)
I think thats the meaning forgot just type it in google.
And you maybe able to get some cheap ones
